sentences.en: ‘How are you?’ ‘Very well, thanks.’
sentences.cn: “你好吗？”“很好，谢谢。”

sentences.en: ‘James doesn’t want to come to the cinema with us.’ ‘Well then, let’s go on our own.’
sentences.cn: “詹姆斯不想和我们一起去看电影。”“那好，我们就自己去吧。”

sentences.en: "Well," he conceded, "I do sometimes mumble a bit."
sentences.cn: “嗯，”他承认道，“我有时候说话的确有点吐字不清。”

sentences.en: "Well," she said a little uneasily, "what is it?"
sentences.cn: “噢，”她有些不自在地说道，“是什么？”

sentences.en: All the team played very well today.
sentences.cn: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
sentences.cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

sentences.en: Did you sleep well?
sentences.cn: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.en: He bowled so well that we won two matches.
sentences.cn: 他的球投得极棒，使我们赢下了两场比赛。

sentences.en: He did well to get such a good mark.
sentences.cn: 他表现不错，得了这么高的分数。

sentences.en: He had the operation yesterday, and he’s doing very well.
sentences.cn: 他昨天做了手术，恢复得很好。

sentences.en: He knew when to leave well alone and when to interfere.
sentences.cn: 他知道什么时候该适可而止，什么时候该插手干预。

sentences.en: he liked Isobel well enough, but wouldn't want to make a close friend of her.
sentences.cn: 他很喜欢伊泽贝尔，但不想跟她成为密友。

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: He's in well with management.
sentences.cn: 他受到管理人员的青睐

sentences.en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentences.cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentences.en: I don’t feel very well.
sentences.cn: 我觉得身体不太舒服。

sentences.en: I feel certain that it will all turn out well.
sentences.cn: 我觉得最后肯定会皆大欢喜。

sentences.en: I hope you get well again soon.
sentences.cn: 希望你早日康复。

sentences.en: I know Birmingham quite well.
sentences.cn: 我很熟悉伯明翰。

sentences.en: I might as well go.
sentences.cn: 我最好还是去

sentences.en: if we got Terry to do that, we'd be well away.
sentences.cn: 如果我们让特里去做那件事，我们将有很大的进步。

sentences.en: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.cn: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.en: Leith was well and truly rattled.
sentences.cn: 利思完全慌乱了。

sentences.en: mentioned other matters as well.
sentences.cn: 也提到了其它事情

sentences.en: Mix the flour and butter well.
sentences.cn: 把面粉和黄油搅匀。

sentences.en: oh very well then, come in.
sentences.cn: 啊，那好，进来吧。

sentences.en: She lowered her bucket into the well.
sentences.cn: 她把水桶放到井里。

sentences.en: she sounded rather chipper, as well she might, given her bright prospects.
sentences.cn: 她听上去兴高采烈，考虑到她前途光明，她有理由这么做。

sentences.en: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.cn: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.en: Sonia might not speak the English language well, but then who did?
sentences.cn: 索尼娅的英语也许说得不好，但谁又说得好呢？

sentences.en: that's all well and good, but why didn't he phone her to say so?.
sentences.cn: 好吧，但他为什么不给她打电话去那样告诉她呢？。

sentences.en: The concert went very well.
sentences.cn: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

sentences.en: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.cn: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.en: The house allocated to them was pleasant and spacious, and well-staffed.
sentences.cn: 分配给他们的房子舒适宽敞，并配齐了工作人员。

sentences.en: The policeman smiled at her. "Pretty dog."— "Oh well, thank you."
sentences.cn: 警察冲她笑了笑，“这狗真漂亮。”——“哦，谢谢。”

sentences.en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentences.cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

sentences.en: Well, I think it’s a good idea anyway.
sentences.cn: 嗯，不管怎么说，我认为这是个好主意。

sentences.en: Well, I'll take your word for it then, love.
sentences.cn: 唔，那我就信你吧，亲爱的。

sentences.en: Well, I’ve had enough and I’m going home!
sentences.cn: 好吧，我受够了，我要回家了！

sentences.en: Well, so much for the producers. But what of the con-sumers?
sentences.cn: 好吧，关于生产商就讲这么多，那关于消费者呢？

sentences.en: You’re looking very well.
sentences.cn: 你看上去身体很好。

words.tran_cn: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地

phrases.tran_cn: ［用于在引出或确认第二句话之前对第一句话表示接受］好吧，那也好

phrases.phrase: as well he (或 she 等) might (或 may)
phrases.tran_cn: ［用于表示说话者认为某个反应恰当或在预料之中］理当如此
（尤指在物质或财政方面）成功，发达，昌盛
处于有影响的地位或受宠于
（对满意或合适的事务）不要去管它，不要画蛇添足

trans.tran_cn: 健康的，情况良好的，可取的
好，出色地，完全地，彻底地，（表示程度）多少，怎样，很，相当，远远地，很可能地
trans.tran_en: in a successful or satisfactory way

trans.tran_cn: （语气词）嗯，唔，哟，噢，哦，不过，好了，那么，算了
trans.tran_en: used to emphasize something you are saying
used to emphasize something you are saying
a deep hole in the ground from which people take water
if someone who has been ill is doing well, they are becoming healthy again
